name: Message
tagline: A jQuery plugin for showing messages around fields and other HTML elements, like for example showing validation messages.
body:
about the plugin ======= Use the message plugin for showing beautiful messages around form fields or other HTML elements. You can show and hide multiple messages on a single field. features ======= * Add messages to fields or any other HTML elements * Add multiple messages to a single field * Add multiple messages of the same type to a single field * No worries of CSS positioning as messages are added to DOM statically installation ======= Installation is super easy. Just follow these steps: Add the jQuery library to your page. Add the message script file to your page. Finally, add the message css file to your page. That's it.!! Easy, right ? how to add messages using this plugin ======= Nothing special needs to be done. Using this plugin, you can add messages to your fields and HTML elements with a single line of code. If you want to leave feedback or want to contribute, contact me at kolge.pratik@gmail.com. And if you are using this plugin in your application, then it would be nice if you tell me about it.
